title: Add is_variable tag to Tensor
body_html:
We have a fair amount of is_variable() checks in torch/csrc/ which currently uses a heavy dynamic_cast. I remember we discussed wanting to put a tag into Variable. This PR does this. I know it's bolting another thing into ATen but this makes sense moving forward with c10, since Tensor and Variable will merge.

Also added some checks to make_variable to ensure that we're not creating a Variable from a data Tensor that is actually a Variable. This can lead to strange bugs I ran into in another PRs.

@zdevito @colesbury @ezyang
